about_the_game:
Note:

The multiplayer mode was already available during the Early Access phase of KeepUp Survival. After leaving the EA phase, it was no longer actively promoted due to ongoing technical challenges but remained part of the game.

This DLC is intended to provide clarity and inform users that a multiplayer mode is available. Please note that this mode is still in development and may encounter issues not present in the single-player mode. Your feedback is important to us to further improve the mode. Thank you for your support and understanding!

KeepUp Survival: Multiplayer Expansion

Expand your survival adventure in KeepUp Survival with the Multiplayer Expansion! Test the new multiplayer features alongside other players and experience how the dynamic world of the game evolves as you work together with friends or other survivors.

In this Multiplayer Expansion, you can experience the fundamentals of the multiplayer mode: fight your way through the harsh conditions of the island with your fellow players, build bases together, explore the mysteries of the world, and survive the dangers of the post-apocalyptic environment. Please note that the multiplayer mode is still under development, and we rely on your feedback to further improve the gameplay experience.

Multiplayer Expansion Features:

  • Survive together: Team up with other players to gather resources, build, and survive.

  • Team base building: Build your own fort together with friends to protect yourselves from the island’s dangers.

  • Dynamic world: Explore a constantly changing world with a dynamic weather system and day-night cycle – alongside other players.

  • Share resources: Trade with other players, share resources, or form larger groups.

The multiplayer mode will be continuously developed to provide the best possible experience, but we reserve the right to adjust or even discontinue its development, depending on player response and interest.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood is displayed when an animal or character is killed.

name: KeepUp Survival - Multiplayer Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience the multiplayer mode in KeepUp Survival! Survive together with other players, build bases, share resources, and explore the world. Please note that the mode is still under development and may be adjusted or discontinued at any time.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Swedish, Turkish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
